name: chevaline_alpha
title: Chevaline Alpha
description: By students, for students. This addon is a suite of features to generally enhance your experience with UAH's online services. If you have any questions or requests, please send them to the package maintainer, we'd like to hear from you!
author: Christopher [ctag] Bero

preferences.name: year
preferences.title: Year to pull courses for. Not Implemented.

preferences.name: semester
preferences.title: Semester to pull courses for. Not Implemented.

preferences.name: sso_enabled
preferences.title: Enable Automatic Login for UAH CAS? Only works if you've stored your CAS credentials in the firefox password manager.

preferences.name: sso_url
preferences.title:
URL to use for Automatic Login.
You should not need to change this.

preferences.name: canvas_enabled
preferences.title: Enable enhancements to your Canvas session?
